blogPost.title: RT @demarionunn: for the last 6 months i’ve been working as a uber eats courier to investigate how delivery is irreversibly changing our co…
blogPost.author: The Economist

sharedContent.title: for the last 6 months i’ve been working as a uber eats courier to investigate how delivery is irreversibly changing our concept of the restaurant, our eating habits, and even work itself. i wrote it up in a long read for @1843mag https://t.co/jGHt05nxIN
sharedContent.author: jonathan nunn

localize.full_text: RT @demarionunn：在过去的6个月里，我一直在做uber eats的快递员，调查快递是如何不可逆转地改变我们的生活。
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 在过去的6个月里，我一直在做uber eats的快递员，调查外卖是如何不可逆转地改变我们对餐厅的概念，我们的饮食习惯，甚至是工作本身。我把它写进了@1843mag的长篇阅读中https://t.co/jGHt05nxIN。

localize.full_text: RT @demarionunn：在過去的6個月裏，我一直在做uber eats的快遞員，調查快遞是如何不可逆轉地改變我們的生活。
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 在過去的6個月裏，我一直在做uber eats的快遞員，調查外賣是如何不可逆轉地改變我們對餐廳的概念，我們的飲食習慣，甚至是工作本身。我把它寫進了@1843mag的長篇閱讀中https://t.co/jGHt05nxIN。

previous.title: The African Continental Free Trade Area is part of the African Union's plan to turn the continent into a global economic power over the next few decades https://t.co/DFasS17vGf

localize.full_text: 非洲大陆自由贸易区是非洲联盟计划在未来几十年内将非洲大陆变成一个全球经济强国的一部分，https://t.co/DFasS17vGf。
非洲大陸自由貿易區是非洲聯盟計劃在未來幾十年內將非洲大陸變成一個全球經濟強國的一部分，https://t.co/DFasS17vGf。

next.title: “I wouldn't be surprised if solar ends up being 50% of the world’s electricity by 2050.” Analyst @solar_chase tells @Eaterofsun that the energy form is currently “the cheapest source of electricity in many countries.” https://t.co/tXwMVNFdNR

localize.full_text: "如果到2050年，太阳能最终占到世界电力的50%，我不会感到惊讶。" 分析师@solar_chase告诉@Eaterofsun，这种能源形式目前是 "许多国家最便宜的电力来源 "https://t.co/tXwMVNFdNR。
"如果到2050年，太陽能最終佔到世界電力的50%，我不會感到驚訝。" 分析師@solar_chase告訴@Eaterofsun，這種能源形式目前是 "許多國家最便宜的電力來源 "https://t.co/tXwMVNFdNR。
